SEARCH
Module imagingbook.common
Package imagingbook.common.filter.mask

Class CircularMask

java.lang.Object
imagingbook.common.filter.mask.BinaryMask
imagingbook.common.filter.mask.CircularMask
public class CircularMask extends BinaryMask
Defines a circular mask with the specified radius. Mask values are 1 inside the radius, 0 outside. Mask dimensions are square and odd, the reference point is as the center.
